snippet: Mr. Mimaroglu wrote electronic music, worked with Charles Mingus on some of Mingus’s last albums and was the president of his own record label, Finnadar.
abstract: Ilhan Mimaroglu, an electronic music composer and record producer best known for his work with Charles Mingus, dies at age 86.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Mimaroglu wrote electronic music, worked with Charles Mingus on some of Mingus’s last albums and was the president of his own record label, Finnadar.

headline.seo: Ilhan Mimaroglu, Composer and Producer, Is Dead at 86
headline.main: Ilhan Mimaroglu, Composer and Producer, Dies at 86
headline.print_headline: Ilhan Mimaroglu, 86, Composer and Record Producer
